name: I'm just a machine
description:
-I'm just a machine-

I'm just a machine is a game about a robot that wakes up in a underground base questioning what it is.

In this game you solve puzzles mixed with a story.

My YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWb1f7b33Rrn8DGHI_jdUsg?view_as=subscriber
